scripts.dev: CURRENT_DIR=$(pwd); osascript -e "tell application \"Terminal\" to do script \"cd '${CURRENT_DIR}/dumper-shop-backend' && npm run dev\"" -e "tell application \"Terminal\" to do script \"cd '${CURRENT_DIR}/dumper-shop-frontend' && npm run dev\""
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd dumper-shop-frontend && npm install && cd ../dumper-shop-backend && npm install
